verses.verse: And it came to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> men <WH120> began <WH2490> to multiply <WH7231> on <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth, <WH127> and daughters <WH1323> were born <WH3205> unto them,

That the sons <WH1121> of God <WH430> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the daughters <WH1323> of men <WH120> that <WH3588> they <WH2007> were fair; <WH2896> and they took <WH3947> them wives <WH802> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> which <WH834> they chose. <WH977>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> My spirit <WH7307> shall not <WH3808> always <WH5769> strive <WH1777> with man, <WH120> for that he <WH1931> also <WH7945> <WH1571> is flesh: <WH1320> yet his days <WH3117> shall be <WH1961> a hundred <WH3967> and twenty <WH6242> years. <WH8141>

There were <WH1961> giants <WH5303> in the earth <WH776> in those <WH1992> days; <WH3117> and also <WH1571> after <WH310> that, <WH3651> when <WH834> the sons <WH1121> of God <WH430> came in <WH935> unto <WH413> the daughters <WH1323> of men, <WH120> and they bore <WH3205> children to them, the same <WH1992> became mighty men <WH1368> which <WH834> were of old, <WH4480> <WH5769> men <WH376> of renown. <WH8034>

And GOD <WH3068> saw <WH7200> that <WH3588> the wickedness <WH7451> of man <WH120> was great <WH7227> in the earth, <WH776> and that every <WH3605> imagination <WH3336> of the thoughts <WH4284> of his heart <WH3820> was only <WH7535> evil <WH7451> continually. <WH3605> <WH3117>
And it repented <WH5162> the LORD <WH3068> that <WH3588> he had made <WH6213> <WH853> man <WH120> on the earth, <WH776> and it grieved <WH6087> him at <WH413> his heart. <WH3820>

And the LORD <WH3068> said, <WH559> I will destroy <WH4229> <WH853> man <WH120> whom <WH834> I have created <WH1254> from <WH4480> <WH5921> the face <WH6440> of the earth; <WH127> both man, <WH4480> <WH120> and <WH5704> beast, <WH929> and <WH5704> the creeping thing, <WH7431> and <WH5704> the fowls <WH5775> of the air; <WH8064> for <WH3588> it repenteth <WH5162> me that <WH3588> I have made <WH6213> them.
But Noah <WH5146> found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in the eyes <WH5869> of the LORD. <WH3068>

These <WH428> are the generations <WH8435> of Noah: <WH5146> Noah <WH5146> was <WH1961> a just <WH6662> man <WH376> and perfect <WH8549> in his generations, <WH1755> and Noah <WH5146> walked <WH1980> with <WH854> God. <WH430>
And Noah <WH5146> begot <WH3205> three <WH7969> sons, <WH1121> <WH853> Shem, <WH8035> <WH853> Ham, <WH2526> and Japheth. <WH3315>
The earth <WH776> also was corrupt <WH7843> before <WH6440> God, <WH430> and the earth <WH776> was filled <WH4390> with violence. <WH2555>

And God <WH430> looked upon <WH7200> <WH853> the earth, <WH776> and, behold, <WH2009> it was corrupt; <WH7843> for <WH3588> all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> had corrupted <WH7843> <WH853> his way <WH1870> upon <WH5921> the earth. <WH776>

And God <WH430> said <WH559> unto Noah, <WH5146> The end <WH7093> of all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> is come <WH935> before <WH6440> me; for <WH3588> the earth <WH776> is filled <WH4390> with violence <WH2555> through them; <WH4480> <WH6440> and, behold, <WH2009> I will destroy <WH7843> them with <WH854> the earth. <WH776>

Make <WH6213> thee an ark <WH8392> of gopher <WH1613> wood; <WH6086> rooms <WH7064> shalt thou make <WH6213> <WH853> in the ark, <WH8392> and shalt pitch <WH3722> it within <WH4480> <WH1004> and without <WH4480> <WH2351> with pitch. <WH3724>

And this <WH2088> is the fashion which <WH834> thou shalt make <WH6213> it of: The length <WH753> of the ark <WH8392> shall be three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> cubits, <WH520> the breadth <WH7341> of it fifty <WH2572> cubits, <WH520> and the height <WH6967> of it thirty <WH7970> cubits. <WH520>

A window <WH6672> shalt thou make <WH6213> to the ark, <WH8392> and in <WH413> a cubit <WH520> shalt thou finish <WH3615> it above; <WH4480> <WH4605> and the door <WH6607> of the ark <WH8392> shalt thou set <WH7760> in the side <WH6654> thereof; with lower, <WH8482> second, <WH8145> and third <WH7992> stories shalt thou make <WH6213> it.

And, behold, <WH2009> I, even I, <WH589> do bring <WH935> <WH853> a flood <WH3999> of waters <WH4325> upon <WH5921> the earth, <WH776> to destroy <WH7843> all <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> wherein <WH834> is the breath <WH7307> of life, <WH2416> from under <WH4480> <WH8478> heaven; <WH8064> and every thing <WH3605> that <WH834> is in the earth <WH776> shall die. <WH1478>

But with <WH854> thee will I establish <WH6965> <WH853> my covenant; <WH1285> and thou shalt come <WH935> into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> thou, <WH859> and thy sons, <WH1121> and thy wife, <WH802> and thy sons' <WH1121> wives <WH802> with <WH854> thee.

And of every <WH4480> <WH3605> living thing <WH2416> of all <WH4480> <WH3605> flesh, <WH1320> two <WH8147> of every <WH4480> <WH3605> sort shalt thou bring <WH935> into <WH413> the ark, <WH8392> to keep them alive <WH2421> with <WH854> thee; they shall be <WH1961> male <WH2145> and female. <WH5347>

Of fowls <WH4480> <WH5775> after their kind, <WH4327> and of <WH4480> cattle <WH929> after their kind, <WH4327> of every <WH4480> <WH3605> creeping thing <WH7431> of the earth <WH127> after his kind, <WH4327> two <WH8147> of every <WH4480> <WH3605> sort shall come <WH935> unto <WH413> thee, to keep them alive. <WH2421>

And take <WH3947> thou <WH859> unto thee of all <WH4480> <WH3605> food <WH3978> that <WH834> is eaten, <WH398> and thou shalt gather <WH622> it to <WH413> thee; and it shall be <WH1961> for food <WH402> for thee, and for them.
Thus did <WH6213> Noah; <WH5146> according to all <WH3605> that <WH834> God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> him, so <WH3651> did <WH6213> he.
